#include <iostream>

#define MAX_N 100
#define INF 1000000001

int times[MAX_N][MAX_N];

int main() {
	int N, M;
	std::cin >> N >> M;

	int T;
	int maxMin = -1;
	for (int i = 0; i < N; i++) {
		int min = INF;
		for (int j = 0; j < M; j++) {
			std::cin >> T;
			times[N][M] = T;

			if (T < min) min = T;
		}
		if (min > maxMin) maxMin = min;
	}
	std::cout << maxMin << "\n";
}
